name: Alien Contact
description: SETI came to us with this sound recording and they claim that there's an intelligent lifeform trying to contact us. Can you see if you can make any sense of it?
hint:
I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book. ~ Groucho Martin1 950

For all our foreign competitors, if you've solved this problem, please message us on IRC.
